import React, { Component } from 'react'; import AddToCart from './AddToCart'; const Product = (props)=>{ const {imageUrl, offerText, brandName, productName, price, mrf, quantity, count, productId} = props.product; return (
{offerText} OFF

{brandName}

{productName}
{quantity}
MRP {price}
Rs {mrf}
); } export default Product;
